verses.name: Luke 23:1
verses.text: And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.

verses.name: Luke 23:2
verses.text: And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this fellow perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to Cesar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.

verses.name: Luke 23:3
verses.text: And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest it.

verses.name: Luke 23:4
verses.text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people, I find no fault in this man.
